name: Timbuktu Historic Mosque
description: One of the oldest mosques in Mali, dating back to the 14th century.

name: Sankore University
description: A historic center of learning known for its ancient manuscripts.

name: Timbuktu Museum
description: A museum showcasing ancient artifacts and manuscripts from Mali's past.

name: Djinguereber Library
description: A medieval library with thousands of ancient manuscripts dating back centuries.

name: Timbuktu Market
description: A vibrant marketplace where traders sell crafts, spices, and handmade textiles.

name: Sidi Yahya Mosque
description: A sacred mosque known for its architectural beauty and deep historical significance.

name: Timbuktu Port
description: An essential river port facilitating trade and transportation in Mali.

name: Ahmed Baba Institute
description: A major research center dedicated to preserving Mali's rich literary heritage.
